name: rss-tracker
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run prep-test && node pack.mjs
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.prep-test: npx tsc src/FeedAssembler.ts --module esnext --moduleResolution node --isolatedModules true --importHelpers true --allowJS true --target esnext --outDir test/scripts

author: @WetHat
